name: Rocky Patel 2nds - The Edge - Lite Connecticut Torpedo
additionalNotes: The Rocky Patel Vintage 1990 and 1992 Seconds represent an excellent value for money within the range of cigars offered by Rocky Patel and his team. With a mix of Nicaraguan and Dominican cigars in the filling, Nicaraguan layers and 10-year-old Ecuadorian wraps, these cigars maintain the unmistakable flavor characteristic of the Rocky Patel Vintage line that we so much appreciate. Discover the exceptional quality and flavor that have made Rocky Patel famous with the Vintage 1990 and 1992 Seconds.
